Package de.tum.in.ase.eist.view

Class GameBoardUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
de.tum.in.ase.eist.view.GameBoardUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class GameBoardUI
extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class implements the user interface for controlling the player. The user interface is implemented as a Thread that is started by clicking the start button on the tool bar and stops by the stop button.

  • Property Summary

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage​(java.lang.String ImageFilePath)
      Set and image
      Parameters:
      ImageFilePath - : an image file path that needs to be available in the resources folder of the project
      Returns:
      Image image at *ImageFilePath*

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the GameBoardUI Thread, if it wasn't running. Starts the game board, which causes the UIElements to move. Renders graphics and updates tool bar status.

    • convertPosition

      public Point2D convertPosition​(Point2D toConvert)
      Converts position of UIElement to position on the canvas
      Parameters:
      toConvert - the point to be converted
      Returns:
      Point2D converted Point

    • stopGame

      public void stopGame()
      Stops the game board and set the tool bar to default values.
